name: Zoho WorkDrive
description: Team collaboration and file storage platform for businesses

opengraph.title: Zoho WorkDrive | Online file management for teams
opengraph.description: Zoho WorkDrive is a content collaboration platform designed for teams to store, share, manage, and work together on files of any size
